pages.text: $(li)The Nether portal allows you to enter in the Nether dimension.$(br)$(li)You can find partially created portals in the $(l:patchouli:structures/ruined_portal)Overworld$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:structures/ruined_portal_end)End$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can created it manually too, with $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/obsidian)Obsidian$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/crying_obsidian)Crying Obsidian$(/l).

$(li)Finally, just right click inside of the Nether Portal with the $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/flint_and_steel)Flint and Steel$(/l) or a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/fire_charge)Fire Charge$(/l) to generate fire and turn it on.
